Description: Painted pottery shabti of Meryra with a blue lappet-wig with braids, a modelled brown face with black features, a yellow collar, a white body and parallel brown hands in low relief; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted hieroglyphs on a yellow ground flanked by red lines.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
